com.incors.plaf.alloy
Class AlloyCommonUtilities

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.incors.plaf.alloy.AlloyCommonUtilities
public class AlloyCommonUtilities
extends java.lang.Object

The class AlloyCommonUtilities provides static method to support some functionality that can be used by developers when working with the Alloy Look&Feel.

Method Detail

set3DBackground

public static void set3DBackground(javax.swing.AbstractButton b,
                                   java.awt.Color c)
This method sets the background of the specified abstract button to the specified color and makes the button paint the background with a slight 3D effect.

This method is necessary because calling setBackground(Color c) of an AbstractButton will cause the background to be painted without 3D effect.

In many cases you will have to set the button to non-opaque to prevent a strange effect at the corners of the button.

Here is a simple example of this methods usage:

JButton myButton = new JButton("OK");
AlloyCommonUtilities.set3DBackground(myBotton, Color.orange);
myButton.setOpaque(false);
